trans-unit.source: Represents a single property in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> class with the specified name and value.
The property name.
The property value.
Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> references the same XML element as the original.
Modifications to the name or value of a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
However, depending on property evaluation, the two copies could have different <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A> property values.

A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> can be independently modified.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property.
Gets the final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
The final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property was imported into the project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the property name.
The property name.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns the string that represents the property <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>.
The string that represents the property <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>.
Gets or sets the property value.
The property value.
